min.label: Minimum date
min.description: Minimum date value. If 0, empty or null, then there is no minimal constraint.

max.label: Maximum date
max.description: Maximum date value. If 0, empty or null, then there is no maximal constraint.

format.label: Date format
format.description: The date format is a string (in PHP's DateTime `format()`) that manages how to format the date value for display. Defaults to "Y-m-d H:i:s"
